text:
yes it's possible, use command

Npx hs fetch --portal= portal id (folder path live )  ( floder path locally )

Hey Guys,
I need little help. I'm trying to submit my Email Template on the marketplace. I'm getting an attached error. can anyone help me to fix this error?
Any help would be much appreciated!
thanks

So I am trying to finish up our custom template for quotes.  The last stupid thing is no one seems to be able to tell me how to call up the Deal ID associated with the quote.  The Quote ID is not useful as it cant be used to update status in bulk (how we need to interact with our archaic ERP)

I needed a quick solution in order to finish the work in one day.  So, I ended up using multiple dnd_area tags for the various modules.  That way if I need to put something static in between them down the road, when there are hundreds of instances of them, it can be done within just the template.
